channel.title: Balint Pekker | bpekker.dev
channel.description: A collection of 'recipes' related posts | bPekker.dev

item.title: The Drupal Prep Manual: Recipes!
item.description: Does the process of configuring modules and setting up content types manually from scratch sound all too familiar? Have you ever wished for a secret ingredient to simplify your Drupal development process? That's exactly what recipes bring to the table: a structured approach to site building that saves you precious hours of trial and error. After all, in the world of development, time equals money.
